text: Is there any unkindness

speaker: LAFEW
text: question for your residence.

text: It may be you have mistaken him, my lord.

text: And shall do so ever, though I took him at ’s

speaker: LAFEW
text: prayers. Fare you well, my lord, and believe this of

speaker: LAFEW
text: me: there can be no kernel in this light nut. The

speaker: LAFEW
text: matter of heavy consequence. I have kept of them

speaker: LAFEW

speaker: LAFEW
